property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. You gain life equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {3}{W}, Sacrifice another artifact: Aerial Toastmaster assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Amateur Auteur: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So Griselbrand was bound, his rage brought to a halt. 'Til Lili Vess came 'round asking, "Hey, what's in the vault?" - INNISTRAD! The Musical

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Amateur Auteur: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elspeth, blessed by Heliod, stepped up where the hydra trod. Soon afterward, a lesson learned: attack the Champion, get burned! - THEROS! The Musical

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Amateur Auteur: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The two Eldrazi titans fell and set the ground a-rumbling! "How come no one ever listens?" old Ugin flew off grumbling. - ZENDIKAR! The Musical

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Amateur Auteur: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And thus at Maze's End the runners end their strife. Our saving grace, that hooded kid, is now Guildpact for life. - RAVNICA! The Musical

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token. {1}{W}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose any kind of counter a printed card refers to, then put one of that counter on target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Chivalrous Chevalier enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand unless you compliment an opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I treat every foe according to the highest codes of conduct. Then I kill them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Do-It-Yourself Seraph attacks, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle. Do-It-Yourself Seraph has the text box of each card exiled with Do-It-Yourself Seraph in addition to its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 1 life for each person who high-fives you in the next thirty seconds. Each player in an Un-game who high-fives you gains 1 life. (Offer high fives. Don't hit people.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Up high! To the side! Down low! To the left! Other left! Over here - "

property.name: Rules
property.value: When GO TO JAIL enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until GO TO JAIL leaves the battlefield. At the beginning of the upkeep of the exiled card's owner, that player rolls two six-sided dice. If they roll doubles, sacrifice GO TO JAIL.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you're dealt damage, Augment {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, Augment {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Jackknight. If that artifact is a Contraption, Jackknight gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My sword is at your service, as are my scissors, corkscrew, and bottle opener."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from black borders (Nothing with a black border can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the garlic press."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from even collector numbers (Nothing with an even collector number can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the gravy boat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from loose lips (Nothing with an open mouth in its artwork can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the juicer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from odd collector numbers (Nothing with an odd collector number can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the melon baller."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from two-word names (Nothing with exactly two words in its name can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature. Hyphenated words are one word.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the olive forks."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from watermarks (Nothing with a watermark can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the tea cozy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Knight of the Widget's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Order of the Widget watermarks among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His armor is lightweight titanium alloy, but his will is iron.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X Contraptions. Assemble X plus one Contraptions. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy each creature with an odd number of words in its name. (Hyphenated words are one word.) • Destroy each creature with an even number of words in its name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The odds are good, but the goods are odd.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature without reminder text. (Reminder text is still any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say you're capable of flying. You got any proof of that?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Horse creature you control that wasn't put onto the battlefield with this ability this turn, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature blocks, Augment {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Riveting Rigger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Riveting Rigger and it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Turn a blender into an arc welder with a portable fusion reactor and a frozen yogurt dispenser? We can do it!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: State-based actions don't apply to you or other permanents you control. (You don't lose the game due to having 0 or less life or drawing from an empty library. Your creatures aren't destroyed due to damage or deathtouch and aren't put into a graveyard due to having 0 or less toughness. Your planeswalkers aren't put into a graveyard if they have 0 loyalty. You don't put a legendary permanent into a graveyard if you control two with the same name. Counters aren't removed from your permanents due to game rules. Permanents you control attached or combined illegally remain on the battlefield. For complete rules and regulations, see rule 704.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: A person outside the game chooses an attacking or blocking creature target opponent controls. That player sacrifices that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In recursive chess, one piece can capture another only after beating it in a game of recursive chess.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player in an Un-game you can see from your seat gains control of target creature you control until your next turn. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature. (A creature is on the battlefield of only the game its controller is playing.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a host or has augment, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who witness my work often question its necessity. I've never understood that." - Dr. Julius Jumblemorph

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}, Sacrifice Teacher's Pet: Search your library for a card with augment, combine it with target host you control, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First attempt: unsuccessful. Instead of an amphibious chicken, hybridization produced an aquaphobic fish."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant your library Enchanted library is an artifact creature on the battlefield with power and toughness each equal to the number of cards in it. It's still a library. If enchanted library would leave the battlefield, exile Animate Library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blurry (This creature can be blocked only if defending player was wearing glasses as it was cast.) Whenever Blurry Beeble deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Chipper Chopper enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Chipper Chopper and it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Clocknapper enters the battlefield, choose beginning phase, precombat main phase, combat phase, postcombat main phase, or ending phase. Steal that phase from target player during their next turn. (That phase occurs as though it's your turn instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, this creature assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying named Storm Crow. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storm crow lonely, boon for a birder. Storm crows together, likely a murder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defective Detective can't be blocked. When Defective Detective enters the battlefield, a person outside the game looks at target opponent's hand and chooses a card from it. That player reveals that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing gets by her . . . except the evidence, the motive, and the culprit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent into your hand. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color the next time you cast that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dognapping is such an ugly word. I would characterize this as a unilateral redistribution of pets."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All graveyards are also your graveyards. Graveyard Busybody's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards with flavor text in your graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You have to hang around the graveyard if you want to catch the talking dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Augment {5}{U} ({5}{U}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assemble X Contraptions. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After a hundred failed patent applications, Cornelian was stunned to find that no one had ever created a steam-powered autonomous ice cream delivery system. He immediately designed a gnome with scoops for hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells you cast that refer to artifacts or Contraptions in their rules text cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's wrong, dear? Nothing a 44-to-22 bronze spur gear and reducer pairing couldn't fix, I bet."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Magic Word enters the battlefield, choose a word. Whisper the chosen word: Tap enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add or subtract 1 or one from a number or number word on target spell or permanent until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Novellamental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This pendant was my grandmother's legacy. I sought solitude among the trees as moonlight danced on their branches, her gift safe in my hand."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Novellamental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The chain fit my neck perfectly, but my heart fluttered with chills as the cool metal came to rest against my chest. I closed the clasp and waited, silent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Novellamental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My grandmother had sold the rest of her jewelry long ago, but she left a particular necklace in my care: a golden chain, bearing a raven-shaped charm."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Novellamental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My heart filled with warmth, and I felt my feet lift from the ground. Suddenly, I was free - free to soar, the homes beneath me shrinking to specks on a map."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Target player mills X cards, where X is the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it has an Agents of S.N.E.A.K. watermark, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Uninstall all results from Socketed Sprocketer, then roll a six-sided die. Install the result on Socketed Sprocketer. (Put the die on this card.) You may uninstall a result from Socketed Sprocketer to use it for a die you rolled. Uninstall a 6 from Socketed Sprocketer: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Spy Eye deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card from that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That pigeon knows something, and we will find out what." - X

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Suspicious Nanny deals combat damage to a player, it reassembles target Contraption that player controls. (Gain control of it and move it onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Afternoon, folks. Lovely day for a stroll with my authentic human baby."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone other than a goblin would've gotten only a hand caught in the cookie jar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. • Target creature can't be blocked this turn. • Draw a card. If that card's art is by Wayne England, you may reveal it and draw another card. • Assemble a Contraption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Untap two target permanents. • Tap each permanent target player controls with exactly one word in its name. • Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards. • Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Draw a card from an opponent's library. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1. • Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Return target permanent to its controller's hand. • Draw two cards, then discard a card. • Change the target of target spell with a single target. • Turn over target nontoken creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Counter target black-bordered spell. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Untap each permanent you control with a watermark. • Roll two six-sided dice. Target player mills X cards, where X is the total of those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Scry 3. • Create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token with menace. • Add or subtract 1 or one from a number or number word on target spell or permanent until end of turn. • Return all artifacts target player controls to their owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender You may tap an untapped Wall you control to have any player reroll a die that player rolled.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You need a six? All right everyone, she needs a six!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Target opponent loses life equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: target creature gets -x/-x until end of turn, where x is the number of times a capital letter appears in its rules text. (ignore reminder text and flavor text.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The S.N.E.A.K. Code clearly permits looting corpses for parts. That just meant Agent 47.3 had to make sure her target was dead first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Hangman enters the battlefield, secretly note a word with six to eight letters. {1}: Target player who doesn't control Hangman guesses the noted word or an unguessed letter in that word. If they guess wrong, put a +1/+1 counter on Hangman. Any player may activate this ability. When a player guesses the noted word or all of its letters, sacrifice Hangman.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. Whenever a player's skin or fingernail touches enchanted creature, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hoisted Hireling has flying as long as it's being held above the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zarv no longer trusted the kitten posters telling him to "hang in there."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. On a 3 or 4, put a +1/+1 counter on Inhumaniac. On a 5 or higher, put two +1/+1 counters on it. On a 1, remove all +1/+1 counters from Inhumaniac.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Reveal Masterful Ninja from your hand: Masterful Ninja is on the battlefield and in your hand until end of turn. {1}{B}: Masterful Ninja gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may activate Ninja's augment ability any time you could cast an instant. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, Augment {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as - oh, nevermind.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Old-Fashioned Vampire gets +2/+2 and has deathtouch as long as it's dark outdoors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stalking hard or hardly stalking, am I right?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature cards in graveyards can attack and block as though they were on the battlefield, can block or be blocked only by creature cards in graveyards, are Zombies in addition to their other types, and have undeathtouch. (If they would deal damage to a creature card, exile that creature card instead.) Creature cards in your graveyard have haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Overt Operative deals combat damage to a player, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{B}, Exile a permanent you control with a League of Dastardly Doom watermark: Return a permanent card with a League of Dastardly Doom watermark from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the fourth funeral, the mooks had gotten pretty good at them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skull Saucer enters the battlefield, destroy target creature and put your head on the table. Sacrifice Skull Saucer when your head stops touching the table.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No body is ready for this kind of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with the longest name. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Serious, Nonstop Espionage and Kidnapping.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target creature facing left in its art. (Creatures without faces don't face anywhere.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Silent Ninjas Evading Any Kapture.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player loses a finger until Sly Spy leaves the battlefield. (The finger is chosen by its owner and can't roll dice or touch cards.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Sinister Nerds Eliminating All Knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target creature facing right in its art. (Creatures without faces don't face anywhere.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Skilled, Notably Efficient Assassin-Kickers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals the top card of their library. Put that card into your hand and you lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Spies Nimbly Eluding Adversaries' Knives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, roll a six-sided die. That player loses life equal to the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K. - Subpar, Notoriously Evil Agent Killers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may tap Snickering Squirrel to increase the result of a die any player rolled by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this line of work, you've got to know how to squirrel things away. Quite literally, in my case."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) {PB}{PB}{PB}{PB}: Reveal a card you own from outside the game that has been banned or restricted in a Constructed format and put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Increase the result of each die you roll by 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lucinda didn't know which she enjoyed most: the science, the squirrels, or the maniacal laughter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Steady-Handed Mook enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mook's life span is just long enough to get just good enough to get careless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A person outside the game looks at target opponent's hand and chooses a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Martha was in and out in exactly two minutes - thirty seconds to administer the poison plus a minute and a half to properly refold the napkins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield under your control. They're Zombies in addition to their other types. (Remove those cards from your deck before beginning a new game.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}: Combine Zombified from your graveyard with target host. {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Augment {4}{B} ({4}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{BR}{BR}, {T}: Roll a six-sided die. Create a number of 1/1 red Brainiac creature tokens equal to the result. Tap three untapped Brainiacs you control: The next time you would roll a six-sided die, instead roll two six-sided dice and use the total of those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skrab tried to warn his fellow goblins that the hammer was bait for a trap, but they stopped listening at "hammer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players play a Magic subgame, starting at 1 life and using their libraries as their decks. For the rest of the main game, if a source would deal damage to a player who didn't win the subgame, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. This creature deals damage equal to the result to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Frenzy 2 (Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.) Garbage Elemental can't be blocked by wordy creatures. (A creature is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.) Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the difference between those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Garbage Elemental deals damage equal to the result to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) Each creature you control with any kind of counter on it has art menace. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with two or more visible figures in their art.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.) Battalion - Whenever Garbage Elemental and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Other creatures you control wearing hats in their art have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An accessory in every sense of the word.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent was dealt damage this turn, Augment {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature and roll a six-sided die. Until end of turn, it gains haste and gets +X/+0, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Need a hammer? Gotta get your fix? I know a guy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Hammer Jammer enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Hammer Jammer enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the result. Whenever you roll a die, remove all +1/+1 counters from Hammer Jammer, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell with a Goblin Explosioneers watermark, Hammerfest Boomtacular deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's less "music" and more "straightforward hearing damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says, "It's so infinite that its flavor text says,

property.name: Rules
property.value: When It That Gets Left Hanging enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game to high-five you. If they won't, It That Gets Left Hanging gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Just Desserts deals π damage to target creature. (π is the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter. (It's a smidgen more than 3.))

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's time to put the ‘die' in ‘diameter!'" - Flaky the Irrational

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. Painiac gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the result.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're about to be struck by a brilliant idea!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste You can attack with Party Crasher once each combat during each opponent's turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No rest. No mercy. No reservations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Riggers you control get +1/+0 and have haste. If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't quit now, we're almost done. Then we'll build another one!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Steamflogger of the Month enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption for each Contraption you control. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}, {T}: Steamflogger Temp assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you're dumber than a hammer, every problem looks like one of those things you hit with a hammer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a six-sided die. Assemble a number of Contraptions equal to the result. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins only have two speeds: hard loaf and full-on hammer freak-out.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This spell can deal excess damage to its target's controller.) Super-Duper Death Ray deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple strike (This creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's true that two heads are better than one, but after that you run into diminishing returns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assemble two Contraptions. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets. Then repeat this process.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ig and Burf discovered the technique by accident when Burf reached for his hammer and missed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wrench-Rigger enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin innovator, goblin corpse. Tomayto, tomahto.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Whenever you roll a die, put a number of luck counters on As Luck Would Have It equal to the result. Then if there are 100 or more luck counters on As Luck Would Have It, you win the game. (Count both rolls if you reroll a die.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've not seen one of these on the podium for many seasons. Such magnificent posture and the perfect amount of telltale odor."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Something really special in the baloth category this season, in terms of spike density and quality. We'd like to get a word with the handler, but are unable to locate her at this time."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not a surprise to see her on the podium. This paragon of tusk curvature is just the latest addition to the long championship lineage of Wildspeaker Ranch."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A stunning example of the breed! Flawless plating, ruthlessly efficient death stroke, and an excellent drool shimmer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you roll a 4 or higher on a die, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One fateful night, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, they rose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a host card or a card with augment, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At Crossbreed Labs, "heads or tails" has nothing to do with coins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G} for each Crossbreed Labs watermark among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Others try to be the best in their class. She strives to be the best in her phylum.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may untap target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squirrellink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to create that many 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.) Creature tokens you control are Squirrels in addition to their other creature types. Other Squirrels you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Picking hammers is dangerous, but it's still safer than harvesting saw bushes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Roll a six-sided die. Ground Pounder gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result. Whenever you roll a 5 or higher on a die, Ground Pounder gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: People came from miles away just to see the head of the hammer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, Augment {G} ({G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Hydradoodle enters the battlefield, roll X six-sided dice. Hydradoodle enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the total of those results. Reach, trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose Flavorful or Bland. • Flavorful - Whenever a creature with flavor text enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. • Bland - Whenever a creature without flavor text enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this assemblage of various stuff!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose an artist. Whenever a creature with art by the chosen artist enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this assortment of diverse things!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose white-bordered or silver-bordered. Whenever a creature with the chosen border enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this collection of miscellaneous items!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a rarity. Whenever a creature with the chosen rarity enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this compilation of mixed objects!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose odd or even. Whenever a creature with a collector number of the chosen value enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this gathering of eclectic products!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a number. Whenever a creature with exactly the chosen number of words in its name enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. (Hyphenated words are one word.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hallowed be this potpourri of sundry goods!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Joyride Rigger enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: chitty-chitty-BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG BANG!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Augment {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the result.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, if you rolled a die this turn, Augment {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 if it's a host or has augment. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It smarts more than the average bear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be sure to get the tree in the picture."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Augment {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: Choose one. You may activate this ability while Shellephant is in any zone. • Shellephant has base power and toughness 1/4. • Shellephant has base power and toughness 3/3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Just a second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't move cards on the battlefield.) Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield by being thrown from a distance of at least three feet. When Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield, it fights each creature an opponent controls that it touched as it entered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Squirrel Dealer enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game "Do you like Squirrels?" If they do, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see that sheen on the fur? The glint in their eyes? Top quality. These are the real deal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, Steamflogger Service Rep assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's more like a hard day of lunch with a work break between shifts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever you roll a 4 or higher on a die, put a +1/+1 counter on Willing Test Subject. {6}: Roll a six-sided die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Baron Von Count enters the battlefield with a doom counter on "5." Whenever you cast a spell with the indicated numeral in its mana cost, text box, power, or toughness, move the doom counter one numeral to the left. When the doom counter moves from "1," destroy target player and put that doom counter on "5."

property.name: Rules
property.value: A person outside the game becomes your teammate. (Choose any number of cards in your hand, on top of your library, or on the battlefield under your control. Those cards become your teammate's hand, library, and permanents, respectively.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player moves a permanent they control to touch Cramped Bunker and no other permanents. If the player can't, destroy each permanent they control that isn't touching Cramped Bunker, then sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dr. Julius Jumblemorph is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield). Whenever a host enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card with augment and combine it with that host. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Grand Calcutron can be your commander. When The Grand Calcutron enters the battlefield, each player's hand becomes a program (an ordered row of revealed cards). Players can only play the first card of their program. If a card would be put into a player's hand from anywhere, that player reveals it and places it anywhere within their program instead. At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player's program has fewer than five cards, they draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Combined, enchanted, and equipped creatures you control have menace. {3}{B}{R}, {T}: Put two target creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield combined into one creature under your control. (Its power is equal to their total power, its toughness is equal to their total toughness, and it has their names, mana costs, types, text boxes, etc.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have ten seconds to look at and rearrange the cards in your library. At the end of those ten seconds, if you're touching one or more of those cards, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not a carpet moth, it's a feature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ol' Buzzbark enters the battlefield, roll X six-sided dice onto the battlefield from a height of at least X inches. For each die, put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the result on each creature you control that die is touching. For each die, Ol' Buzzbark deals damage equal to the result to each creature an opponent controls that die is touching.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phoebe, Head of S.N.E.A.K. can't be blocked by creatures with flavor text. {2}{U}{B}: Phoebe permanently steals target creature's text box. (That creature loses all rules text, flavor text, and watermarks. This creature gains them.)

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Head to AskUrza.com and click +1. [-1]: Head to AskUrza.com and click -1. [-6]: Head to AskUrza.com and click -6.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as X is in X's owner's opponent's hand, X's owner may cast X and activate X's abilities. That opponent can't cast X and plays with their hand revealed. {U}{B}, {T}: Put X into target opponent's hand. {3}{U}{B}: You may play a land or cast a spell from the hand X is in. If you cast a spell this way, you cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{BR}: Switch a Killbot or Mary O'Kill in your hand with one on the battlefield. (If a creature is tapped, the switched creature is tapped. The same is true for untapped, attacking, blocking, enchanted, equipped, and targeted. Any counters on a creature are on the switched creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When this creature enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a silver-bordered spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Border Guardian. Whenever you cast a black-bordered spell, Border Guardian can't be blocked this turn. Whenever you cast a white-bordered spell, Border Guardian gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Buzzing Whack-a-Doodle enters the battlefield, you and an opponent each secretly choose Whack or Doodle. Then those choices are revealed. If the choices match, Buzzing Whack-a-Doodle has that ability. Otherwise, it has Buzz. • Whack - {T}: Target player loses 2 life. • Doodle - {T}: You gain 3 life. • Buzz - {2}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Move the CRANK counter to your Contraption deck's next sprocket and crank any number of that sprocket's Contraptions.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps you believe, even in these final moments, that you will be saved. But doom has no snooze button, you fools!" - Baron Von Count

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {4}: Reassemble target Contraption you control. (Move it onto another one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cogs on cats / Cogs on dogs / Cogs on hats / And cogs on cogs." - Song of the Cogmentor

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice Contraption Cannon: It deals damage to any target equal to the number of Contraptions you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Common side effects include headaches, ringing in ears, and excessive smithereens. In some cases, a small hole in space-time may develop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, if Entirely Normal Armchair is in your hand, you may hide it on the battlefield. {0}: Return Entirely Normal Armchair to its owner's hand. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only if they see Entirely Normal Armchair. {2}, Sacrifice Entirely Normal Armchair: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Move a counter from one permanent onto another. If the second permanent refers to any kind of counter, the moved counter becomes one of those counters. Otherwise, it becomes a +1/+1 counter. {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have no cards in hand. {8}, {T}: You gain 10 life. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Everythingamajig: You may put a silver-bordered or acorn permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {C}{C}. Activate only as an instant. {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn. {X}: Everythingamajig becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}, {T}: Say the flavor text on a card in your hand. Target opponent guesses that card's name. You may reveal that card. If you do and your opponent guessed wrong, draw a card. {8}, {T}: Everythingamajig deals 12 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life. Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}. {2}, Discard a card: Search your library for a card that shares a complete word in its name with the name of the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Everythingamajig: Choose target player. At the beginning of the next end step, exchange life totals with that player, exchange control of all permanents you and that player control, and exchange cards in your hands, cards in your libraries, and cards in your graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Homunculus creature token. It must be represented by a unique hand and two fingers at all times, or it ceases to exist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Early testing failed because the clones were all thumbs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kindslaver: A person outside the game controls target player during that player's next turn. Neither player may advise that person until the end of that turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just relax - I brought in a substitute."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would roll a die, instead roll two of those dice and ignore one of those results.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Krark was the kind of goblin who'd lose his thumb in a wager and come right back with "Double or nothing!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, return target host card or card with augment from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Roll a six-sided die. On a 5 or higher, untap it." Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time for you to meet the brains of this operation!" - The Big Idea

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Roll a six-sided die. On a 3 or lower, target player adds {C}. Otherwise, that player adds one mana of any color they choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When it comes down to it, science is more art than science."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you have five seconds to choose a keyword you haven't chosen for a card named Modular Monstrosity today that's been printed on a creature card. If you do, Modular Monstrosity gains that ability. Otherwise, Modular Monstrosity loses all keyword abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has protection from die rolls. (Nothing that lets a player roll a die can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to equipped creature.) Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, if an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Augment {2} ({2}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Split Screen enters the battlefield, shuffle your library and deal it into four libraries. If anything refers to your library, choose one of your libraries for it. Play with your libraries' top cards revealed. When Split Screen leaves the battlefield, shuffle your libraries together.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Staff of the Letter Magus enters the battlefield, choose a consonant other than N, R, S, or T. Whenever a player casts a spell, you gain 1 life for each time the chosen letter appears in that spell's name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Stamp of Approval enters the battlefield, choose a watermark. Creatures you control with the chosen watermark get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}: Augment {4} ({4}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you roll a 5 or higher on a die, Steel Squirrel gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result. {6}: Roll a six-sided die.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Q: Where does a mechanical squirrel hide its nuts? A: In a bolt hole.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that shares a watermark with Secret Base.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of the Widget doesn't believe in traveling light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that shares a watermark with Secret Base.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The location of S.N.E.A.K. HQ is a closely guarded secret.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that shares a watermark with Secret Base.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The League of Dastardly Doom takes the word "headquarters" very seriously.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that shares a watermark with Secret Base.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Goblin Explosioneers, there's no crater like home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that shares a watermark with Secret Base.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "WARNING: Do not feed the rhinopus." - Crossbreed Labs campus advisory

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with watermarks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shopping List Lamp-hand attachment X-ray contact lenses Discount death ray Two-headed hammer Kitten-fish

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Accessories to Murder, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Applied Aeronautics, until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0, gains flying, and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Arms Depot, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Auto-Key, until end of turn, target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types and gains "{T}: You gain 3 life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Bee-Bee Gun, until end of turn, target creature gains "{2}: This creature fights another target creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Boomflinger, roll two six-sided dice. Boomflinger deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the difference between those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Buzz Buggy, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Deadly Poison Sampler, until end of turn, target creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy target creature that player controls."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Dictation Quillograph, until end of turn, target creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Dispatch Dispensary, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token with menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Division Table, target player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Dogsnail Engine, target player gains life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Dual Doomsuits, each time a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Duplication Device, until end of turn, target creature becomes a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Faerie Aerie, create two 1/1 blue Faerie Spy creature tokens with flying, haste, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Genetic Recombinator, up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Gift Horse, roll two six-sided dice. Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the difference between those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Gnomeball Machine, create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Goblin Slingshot, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Guest List, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Hard Hat Area, roll two six-sided dice. Hard Hat Area assembles a number of Contraptions equal to the difference between those results. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Head Banger, target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Hypnotic Swirly Disc, target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Inflation Station, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Insufferable Syphon, target player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Jamming Device, creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Lackey Recycler, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Mandatory Friendship Shackles, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Neural Network, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Oaken Power Suit, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Optical Optimizer, until end of turn, target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types and gains "{T}: Draw a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Pet Project, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Quick-Stick Lick Trick, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Rapid Prototyper, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Record Store, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Refibrillator, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Sap Sucker, add {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Sundering Fork, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Targeting Rocket, target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Thud-for-Duds, roll two six-sided dice. Thud-for-Duds deals damage to target creature equal to the difference between those results.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Top-Secret Tunnel, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Tread Mill, until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+2, gains vigilance, and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Turbo-Thwacking Auto-Hammer, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Twiddlestick Charger, tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you crank Widget Contraption, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
